name: Alysidius
description:
Alysidius finds himself in a dark place,

when he tries to stand up he finds two things tied to his hands

these two things are chains sealed by Hades.

He would either make amends for Hades or he would find a way to escape from the chains of Hades.

There was something that hades overlooked,

the chains were sealed so they wouldn't break from Alysidius' arms

not to be fixed in place.

Using his last strength, Alysidius manages to break the chains from where they are, and realizes that every time he pulls, the chain rings break one by one.

He has a rough road ahead of him, and the only thing that will help him cross it are the chains that break these links.

If Hades is caught, there will be an end for Alysidius... But what if he escapes?
